name: Alien DoomsDay
description:
Creepy aliens are running rampant, seriously they're all over the place . Your job SHOOT EM UP!

CONTROLS :-

WASD - movement

F- pickup items

TAB - inventory

CTRL- crouch

Shift- stamina

1,2,3 keys etc. - Change between weapons in use

click on fireplace/shelter button in inventory - to craft those items,(but you will need to collect cloth and branches) .

Some weapons / cloth / branches are disguised in different colors but they are them same.

IMPORTANT : YOU NEED TO COLLECT ITEMS SUCH AS WATER , FOOD AND MED KITS ETC. TO MAINTAIN YOUR VITALS. The player stats at the left bottom help display you current condition.

Enjoy the game. maybe play some tunes while your destroying those aliens.

ALIENS AREN'T AS AGGRESSIVE NOW , GAME WILL RECEIVE UPDATES AND ALL FUTURE UPDATES ARE FREE IF CURRENT PURCHASE IS MADE. THANK YOU
